hero.headline: Discover The Padel Lifestyle
hero.paragraph: Where the rallies bring you in, but the people make you stay.Play, connect and feel part of something real

downloadPadel.headline: Book your court by downloading the Playtomic app
downloadPadel.paragraph: Start playing today by downloading Playtomic.

fastestGrowing.headline: The fastest growing sport in the world
fastestGrowing.paragraph: Padel is a fast-paced and addictive racket sport that combines the best elements of tennis and squash. With a smaller court and walls, it's extremely easy to pick up! With two clubs built already in the North West and more on the way, Pure Padel will make sure you have bringing the world's fastest growing sport to your doorstep!

services.headline: Events
services.paragraph: Invite your colleagues and clients to experience the fastest growing sport in a unique and private setting.

services.headline: Coaching
services.paragraph: Our expert coaches offer personalised training at all our clubs to help elevate your padel game to the next level!

services.headline: Join The Club
services.paragraph: We operate social clubs where you can meet like-minded players, all with a common interest in this exhilarating sport.

services.headline: Lifestyle
services.paragraph: Invite your colleagues and clients to experience the fastest growing sport in a unique and private setting.

testimonial.quote: Pure Padel is the ultimate padel destination! The atmosphere is fantastic, and it's the perfect place to meet fellow padel enthusiasts.
testimonial.author: Neil. W

faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheadline: Still have questions? All our clubs are here to help

questions.question: How do I book a court?
questions.answer: All court bookings are made through the Playtomic app. Download the app and find Pure Padel to schedule your court time.

questions.question: What is the cancellation policy?
questions.answer: You can cancel your booking more than 24 hrs before your game for a full refund.

questions.question: Can I rent equipment?
questions.answer: Yes, we have rental rackets available in the shop.

questions.question: Do you provide balls?
questions.answer: Balls can only be purchased from the club, not rented. If you book a course or a private lesson however, we will provide you with balls.

questions.question: What do I do if I have never played padel before and want to get involved?
questions.answer: First, we recommend booking onto an Intro to Padel session which we run weekly. Then, you should join our beginners' socials where you can play with other beginners and practise playing in non-competitive match situations! You will find all available courses on the 'Academy' section on Playtomic.

questions.question: How do I book a private coaching?
questions.answer: Please click here and fill out the form and one of our coaches will get in touch with you.

questions.question: Can I book a private event / corporate day?
questions.answer: Yes, absolutely! Please click here and fill out the form and we will get in touch to plan your event with you.
